definition: father's elder brother/senior/paternal elder uncle/eldest of brothers/respectful form of address/Count, third of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next
Epistle of St Paul to the Hebrews

sentences.english: Then, he borrowed the idea of a seven-day week and leap year from the Hebrew calendar.
sentences.chinese: 接着，他借用了希伯來曆法中一週七天和閏年的概念。

sentences.english: He saw an Egyptian beating a Hebrew, one of his kinsmen.
sentences.chinese: 他看到一個埃及人打希伯來人，他的同族。

sentences.english: MICHAEL - From the Hebrew name meaning "who is like God?"
sentences.chinese: 希伯來語的意思是“誰是上帝？”

sentences.english: Now, the Hebrew word "holy" has a root meaning of separate. Separate.
sentences.chinese: 現在，這個希伯來詞語“神聖“，根源的意思是獨立。

sentences.english: At the end of the 6th century BC ketav Ivri was replaced by the Hebrew square script (ketav meruba).
sentences.chinese: 公元前6世紀左右開始被方體希伯來字母取代。

sentences.english: He was an intellectual who understood Hebrew but could not look up a train timetable correctly.
sentences.chinese: 他是懂得希伯來文，卻看不懂火車時刻表的讀書人。

sentences.english: There is less in it of the Hebrew idiom.
sentences.chinese: 有少在它的希伯來文的成語。

sentences.english: Are they Hebrews? So am I. Are they Israelites?

sentences.chinese: 請讀希伯來書十二章5至11節。

sentences.english: It's the Hebrew Bible for Judaism.
Some Hebrews even crossed the Jordan to the land of Gad and Gilead.
sentences.chinese: 有些希伯來人過了約旦河，逃到迦得和基列地。

sentences.english: Take for your meditation today these verses – Hebrews 4: 14 – 16.
sentences.chinese: 讓我們今天默想希伯來書四章14至16節。

sentences.english: "Athena" means in Hebrew a "group of woman together".
sentences.chinese: “雅典娜”是指“一羣女人在一起”在希伯來文。

sentences.english: Hmmm.Stephen,is that a good Hebrew or Aramaic name?
sentences.chinese: 司提反是希伯來語還是亞拉姆語名字？

sentences.english: I am deeply honoured to receive this honorary doctorate from Hebrew University today.
sentences.chinese: 今天獲得希伯來大學頒發名譽博士學位，我深感榮幸。

sentences.english: They are very understanding of my butchered Hebrew.
sentences.chinese: 他們非常瞭解我的屠殺希伯來文。

definition: Abraham (name)/Abraham, father of Judaism and Islam in the Bible and Quran/same as Ibrahim 易卜拉辛
